document.full_text: stocks steadied, bond yields dipped and the euro rose to a one-month high versus the dollar on friday as investors braced for a key u.s. jobs report that could feed debate over whether the economy is headed for a protracted slowdown.
document.title: global stocks tread water before u.s. job data
lines_and_colors: stocks steadied, bond yields dipped and the euro rose to a one-month high versus the dollar on friday as investors braced for a key u.s. jobs report that could feed debate over whether the economy is headed for a protracted slowdown.
